products.title: ToDo app with Go
products.description: Created to learn how to build API servers using standard libraries without frameworks. It is not deployed and can be up and running with docker.

products.title: JWT with Go
products.description: Implement API server for simple JWT authentication. Created to study the implementation of authentication systems. For easy implementation, used PostgreSQL with Supabase instead of docker for DB.

products.title: Personal blog
products.description: Personal blog. I developed it to try to use NotionAPI. Notion as a headless CMS was used.
